mapper.sql: ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, ROLE_CODE, STATUS, CREATED, LASTMOD, CREATER, MODIFYER, IS_DEFAULT
mapper.select:
select
from sys_role where ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and STATUS = 'E'
select ROLE_ID from sys_role WHERE STATUS = 'E' and IS_DEFAULT='Y'
mapper.update: update sys_role set STATUS ='I' WHERE ROLE_ID = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_role (ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, ROLE_CODE, STATUS, CREATED, LASTMOD, CREATER, MODIFYER, IS_DEFAULT) VALUES (#{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastmod,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDefault,jdbcType=CHAR})
